articles.author: Emily Rauhala, Beatriz Ríos
articles.title: E.U. struggles to deal in summit with Hungary stance on Ukraine - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hungary’s veto of Ukraine aid has forced the European Union to consider workarounds in the short term and is bolstering calls to change rules on unanimous voting.
articles.content:
BRUSSELS Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is once again blocking aid for Ukraine. And the European Unions 26 other member states are, once again, furious.
On the eve of Thursdays E.U. summit to… [+4322 chars]

articles.title: Measles surge causes alarm: what scientists think - Nature.com
articles.description: A drastic rise in infections in the United Kingdom and Europe follows a drop in vaccine uptake.
